lines.text: Well, I suppose I should go hunt them down one by one and kill them - God, this is getting so boring!
She's the *devil* - it doesn't count.
Good evening. Would anybody like a drink before you have dinner?
Yeah, how about a...!
How about three more bottles of your best red wine this one's almost gone!
Maggie, I don't like red wine!
Who said anything about YOU I ordered for myself!
Maggie, when did you start drinking?
Look, just bring one bottle of everything and we'll sort it out later!
Certainly. Would that be all?
YES...!
You hoo... People it's me. I'm coming to get you so get really really scared!
Aww... What a nice sweater. Thanks, Alice.
Who brought this?
I did. It's Rocco's present.
Oh, SHIT! I forgot to get the birthday boy a present.
I'm gonna kick your fucking ass bitch!
Come on chicken, right now, come on!
You're a slut, man!
I have to go to the bathroom.
Trust a woman to wanna take a leak right in the middle of a devil hunt.
Well how was I to know the devil would show up?
Why are you carrying this weapon, Sister Franks?
Protection, Mother Superior.
Protection, against what?
Violence.
Fuck this. I should have been a movie star.
She's probably with that blonde guy from 'Animal House'.
